headline: Digital Realty Expands Innovation Lab Network to Singapore, Japan and London to Accelerate AI and Hybrid Cloud Implementation
summary: Asia Pacific and European locations will provide real-world environments for customers and partners to test and optimize next generation infrastructureAUSTIN, Texas, Feb. 25, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Digital Realty (NYSE: DLR), the world’s largest cloud- and carrier-neutral data center platform, today announced the expansion of its Digital Realty Innovation Lab (DRIL) into Singapore, Japan and London.
